title: What are the chances of me becoming a K-pop trainee? I'm 14 years old, although I'm not good at dancing, I do sing well. My classmates say I look Korean but I'm a bit tan because I'm Filipino. - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not gonna repeat what the other ppl have said. Essentially it’s hard either way but your chances are definitely not 0. I know SM recently showed interest in recruiting Filipino trainees. You are young so there is plenty of time for you to be taught how to dance. As long as they see talent within you you might have a chance. Hope this helped! Good luck!
I don't know about your chances of getting in BUT you should audition. I would say your chances of becoming a trainee depends on your skill level on your singing, how well and good it is.
